items.name: Punjabi Chole Masala
items.description: Chickpeas boiled with whole spices then cooked in a freshly made spice blend and flavourful onion & tomato based gravy
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + pickled onion

items.name: Balti Chicken
items.description: Boneless chicken cooked in aromatic and fragrant spices in yogurt, onion & tomato based gravy
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + rice + achar + papad

items.name: Egg paratha
items.description: Indian flat bread with a boiled egg stuffing mixed with some mild spices served with yoghurt + achar. (2 parathas)

items.name: Samosa
items.description: Fried triangular packets with potato based stuffing. (2 samosa)

items.name: Mushroom Kadai Masala
items.description: Mushrooms cooked with petals of onion, tomato and capsicum in freshly ground spice mix in a thick onion & tomato based gravy
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Beef Pepper Curry
items.description: Juicy beef chunks cooked in aromatic spices and pepper in fragrant gravy of onion tomato and coconut based gravy
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Oats Rawa Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made using a batter of oats and rawa (semolina) and some mild spices. Served with coconut chutney. (4 idlis)

items.name: Onion Pakoda
items.description: Sliced onion in a spicy chickpea batter fried in small chunks

items.name: Paneer Lasuni Masala
items.description: Lightly roasted paneer tossed in lip smacking onion & tomato based gravy with aromatic fragrant spices and topped with crispy garlic bits and cream
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar + side salad

items.name: Goan Prawns Ambotik
items.description: A classic Goan recipe with tangy, spicy flavours in a creamy gravy made of coconut milk and aromatic spices

items.name: Moong Dosa
items.description: Pancake made with moong bean batter served with coconut chutney. (3 dosas)
